REASON: To ensure a satisfactory standard of development, and to allow the local planning
authority to review potential changes to the scheme.
description: Application under Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for "non-material" amendments to Condition 1 (revised drawings with design amendments to introduce a second staircore with consequential amendments to unit layouts, mix and elevations) of Reserved Matters application ref. 2021/5032 dated 4th March 2022.
